it.polimi.se2018.model

Class GameSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.GameSingleton

  • public class GameSingleton
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents the game and contains all the objects on the game table. This class is a singleton because there can be only one game at a time.
    Author:
    Daniele Mattioli

        roundTrack - round track of the game
        scoreTrack - score track of the game
